metadata.title: CVE-2017-9299 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Open Ticket Request System (OTRS) 3.3.9 has XSS inindex.pl?Action=AgentStats requests, as demonstrated by OrderBy=[XSS] andDirection=[XSS] attacks. NOTE: this CVE may have limited relevance becauseit represents a 2017 discovery of an issue in software from 2014. The3.3.20 release, for example, is not affected.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-9299` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

otrs - 5.0.7-1
otrs2 - 5.0.7-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: otrs2 package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.0.7-1').
